title: Narrative-Based Science Education for Sustainable Self-Directed Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and professional practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Science competency enhancement program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze their own experiences and apply them to scientific problem-solving with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish and implement future-oriented science development plans using a 5-stage narrative design process.
Learners can improve thematic consistency and depth of reflection in narrative works to over 3.5 points (on a 4-point scale) through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
